verses.text: \w One|strong="G5100"\w* \w day|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* teachers \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Law \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G2064"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w gathered|strong="G4863"\w* \w around|strong="G4314"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* noticed \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G3708"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w ate|strong="G2068"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* food \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* ‘\w defiled|strong="G2839"\w*,’ \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w meant|strong="G1510"\w* unwashed.

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* strict \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w without|strong="G3361"\w* \w first|strong="G3588"\w* scrupulously washing \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, \w holding|strong="G2902"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w traditions|strong="G3862"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* ancestors.

\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G1510"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* market, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w without|strong="G3361"\w* first sprinkling \w themselves|strong="G1510"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w other|strong="G4183"\w* customs \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* inherited \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hold|strong="G2902"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w*, \w such|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* ceremonial washing \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w cups|strong="G4221"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* jugs, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w copper|strong="G5473"\w* pans).

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* teachers \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Law \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w question|strong="G1905"\w* – “\w How|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w your|strong="G1223"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w do|strong="G5101"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* follow \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w traditions|strong="G3862"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* ancestors, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* food \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w defiled|strong="G2839"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*?”

\w His|strong="G4012"\w* answer \w was|strong="G3588"\w*, \wj “\+w It|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w was|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w well|strong="G2573"\+w* \+w said|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w by|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w Isaiah|strong="G2268"\+w* \+w when|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w prophesied|strong="G4395"\+w* \+w about|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w hypocrites|strong="G5273"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1161"\+w* words – ‘\+w This|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w a|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w people|strong="G2992"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w honor|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w with|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w their|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w lips|strong="G5491"\+w*, \+w while|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w their|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w hearts|strong="G2588"\+w* \+w are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w far|strong="G4206"\+w* removed \+w from|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*;\wj*

\wj \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* vainly do \+w they|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w worship|strong="G4576"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*, \+w For|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w they|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w teach|strong="G1321"\+w* \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* human \+w precepts|strong="G1778"\+w*.’\wj*

\wj You neglect \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*’s \+w commandments|strong="G1785"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w hold|strong="G2902"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2316"\+w* human \+w traditions|strong="G3862"\+w*.\wj*

\wj Wisely \+w do|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w set|strong="G2443"\+w* aside \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*’s \+w commandments|strong="G1785"\+w*,”\wj* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w exclaimed|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj “\+w to|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w keep|strong="G5083"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* own \+w traditions|strong="G3862"\+w*!\wj*

\wj \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w while|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Moses|strong="G3475"\+w* \+w said|strong="G3004"\+w* ‘\+w Honor|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*,’ \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* ‘\+w Let|strong="G1063"\+w* anyone \+w who|strong="G3588"\+w* abuses \+w their|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w* \+w suffer|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w death|strong="G2288"\+w*,’\wj*

\wj \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* ‘\+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w a|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w person|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w says|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w to|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w their|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w* “\+w Whatever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w mine|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w might|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w have|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w been|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* service \+w to|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w Corban|strong="G2878"\+w*”’\wj* (\w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w means|strong="G1510"\w* ‘Set apart \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G3004"\w*’) –

\wj why, \+w then|strong="G3765"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3762"\+w* allow \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w anything|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w further|strong="G3765"\+w* \+w for|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w their|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*!\wj*

\wj \+w In|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w way|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* nullify \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w words|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w of|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w by|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w traditions|strong="G3862"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w hand|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w down|strong="G3860"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w similar|strong="G5108"\+w* \+w things|strong="G3588"\+w*.”\wj*

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj “Listen \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*, \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w of|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* mark \+w my|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w words|strong="G2532"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w There|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w external|strong="G1855"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w person|strong="G3739"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w going|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w defile|strong="G2840"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w things|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w come|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w out|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w a|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w person|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w things|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w defile|strong="G2840"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w*.”\wj*
\f + \fr 7.16 \ft Some later manuscripts add: Let anyone with ears to hear, listen.\f*

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1525"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* indoors, away \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w crowd|strong="G3793"\w*, \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* began \w questioning|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w about|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* saying.

\wj “\+w What|strong="G3588"\+w*, \+w do|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w even|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w understand|strong="G3539"\+w* \+w so|strong="G3779"\+w* little?”\wj* \w exclaimed|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w*. \wj “Don’\+w t|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w see|strong="G3539"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w there|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w external|strong="G1855"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* person, \+w which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w by|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w going|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* person, \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w defile|strong="G2840"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w*,\wj*

\wj \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* does \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* pass \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w his|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w heart|strong="G2588"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w his|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w stomach|strong="G2836"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* afterward got rid \+w of|strong="G2532"\+w*?” – \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w saying|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w Jesus|strong="G2532"\+w* pronounced \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w food|strong="G1033"\+w* \+w clean|strong="G2511"\+w*.\wj*

\wj “\+w It|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w what|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w comes|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w out|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w a|strong="G1161"\+w* person,”\wj* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* added, \wj “\+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w defiles|strong="G2840"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w*,\wj*

\wj \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w it|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w within|strong="G2081"\+w*, \+w out|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w hearts|strong="G2588"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w people|strong="G3588"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w there|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w come|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w evil|strong="G2556"\+w* \+w thoughts|strong="G1261"\+w* – \+w sexual|strong="G4202"\+w* \+w immorality|strong="G4202"\+w*, \+w theft|strong="G2829"\+w*, \+w murder|strong="G5408"\+w*, adultery,\wj*
\wj \+w greed|strong="G4124"\+w*, \+w wickedness|strong="G4189"\+w*, \+w deceit|strong="G1388"\+w*, indecency, \+w envy|strong="G3788"\+w*, slander, haughtiness, folly;\wj*

\wj \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w these|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w wicked|strong="G4190"\+w* \+w things|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w come|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w from|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w within|strong="G2081"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w do|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w defile|strong="G2840"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w person|strong="G4190"\+w*.”\wj*

\w On|strong="G1519"\w* \w leaving|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* place, \w Jesus|strong="G1525"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w district|strong="G3725"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Tyre|strong="G5184"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Sidon. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w wish|strong="G2309"\w* \w anyone|strong="G3762"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w escape|strong="G2990"\w* \w notice|strong="G2990"\w*.

\w For|strong="G4012"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w little|strong="G2365"\w* \w daughter|strong="G2365"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* foul \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \w her|strong="G2192"\w*, heard \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w*, \w and|strong="G2064"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2064"\w* threw herself \w at|strong="G4314"\w* \w his|strong="G4012"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* –

\w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* foreigner, \w from|strong="G1537"\w* Syrian Phoenicia – \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w she|strong="G2532"\w* \w begged|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w drive|strong="G1544"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w demon|strong="G1140"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w her|strong="G3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="G2364"\w*.

\wj “\+w Let|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w children|strong="G5043"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w satisfied|strong="G5526"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4413"\+w*,”\wj* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w*. \wj “\+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w fair|strong="G2570"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w take|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w children|strong="G5043"\+w*’s food, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* throw \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w dogs|strong="G2952"\+w*.”\wj*

“\w Yes|strong="G3483"\w*, \w Master|strong="G2962"\w*,” \w she|strong="G2532"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*. “\w Even|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w dogs|strong="G2952"\w* \w under|strong="G5270"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w table|strong="G5132"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w feed|strong="G2068"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w children|strong="G3813"\w*’\w s|strong="G2962"\w* \w crumbs|strong="G5589"\w*.”

\wj “\+w For|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w saying|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w*,”\wj* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj “\+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w may|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w go|strong="G5217"\+w*. \+w The|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w demon|strong="G1140"\+w* \+w has|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w gone|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w out|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w your|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w daughter|strong="G2364"\+w*.”\wj*

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* woman \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w home|strong="G3624"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w child|strong="G3813"\w* lying \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w her|strong="G1519"\w* \w bed|strong="G2825"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w demon|strong="G1140"\w* \w gone|strong="G1831"\w*.

\w On|strong="G1519"\w* \w returning|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w district|strong="G3725"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Tyre|strong="G5184"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G1831"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w way|strong="G3319"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Sidon|strong="G4605"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, across \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w district|strong="G3725"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Ten Towns.
